explanation: [0-0] In a room with a blue floor and white walls, a gymnastics mat stands upright against one wall. A man in a beige hoodie and jeans is bending over next to a large grey exercise ball. Five icons are displayed at the top of the screen: a silver ball, a soccer goal, a chair, a surprised face emoji, and a high-heeled shoe.

[0-2] The man in the beige hoodie jumps onto the grey exercise ball, landing with his feet and hands before placing his head on the ball. He then rolls forward, landing on his feet, and stands up facing forward. The silver ball icon at the top of the screen now has a green outline.

[0-2] The man in the beige hoodie jumps onto the grey exercise ball, landing with his feet and hands before placing his head on the ball. He then rolls forward, landing on his feet, and stands up facing forward. The silver ball icon at the top of the screen now has a green outline.

[2-10] The scene changes to a grassy field with soccer goals, a row of houses visible in the background. A man in a red t-shirt and black pants runs to the right. The scene then cuts to a fallen soccer goalpost, and the man jumps. He lands on one of the posts and balances on it for a moment before the goal is knocked over. The man takes three steps to the right and turns around to see the goal falling towards him. He sprints to the right as one of the goalposts hits his right leg. After pulling his leg free, the man takes two steps to the right, turns around, and walks towards the goal, smiling, bent over, and clutching his chest. The soccer goal icon at the top of the screen now has a green outline.

[10-12] The scene shifts to a grassy field with a line of trees in the background. An overturned chair lies on the grass. A man in a grey hoodie and brown pants runs towards the chair. He kicks the top of the chair with the top of his right foot, knocking the chair upwards. He straightens his legs and lands with his buttocks on the back of the chair. The chair flies away after being struck by his buttocks. The chair icon at the top of the screen now has a red outline.

[12-16] The scene changes to a park with trees and grass. A man in a black t-shirt is standing in the middle of the frame. He leans his body to the left, then to the right. The camera zooms out, revealing that the man is gripping a pull-up bar with both hands and rotating clockwise around the bar. Finally, he returns to his original position, extending his legs to the right for balance. The camera zooms in on the man, whose expression remains unchanged throughout. The surprised face emoji icon at the top of the screen now has a green outline.

[16-23] The scene changes to a yellow house with a chimney and windows. A man in a black and white striped t-shirt, black pants, and black high-heeled shoes stands in front of the house. He raises both hands, then swings his arms backward while bending his knees and squatting down. He then swings his arms forward and raises them overhead, arching his back as he flips backward. While airborne, his legs form a right angle, and he hugs his knees as he continues to flip backward. He lands with bent legs, then stands up and faces forward. The man walks forward as if about to fall. The camera zooms in as the man staggers forward, his center of gravity unsteady.
